Description_lang: Melee attacks against you cause you to gain Focused Will, reducing $?c3[magic damage you take by $426401s1% and physical damage you take by $426401s2% for $426401d][damage you take by $45242s1% for $45242d]$?s137033[][, stacking up to $45242u times].

description_blz.en_US: Melee attacks against you cause you to gain Focused Will, reducing damage you take by 15% for 8 sec, stacking up to 1 times.
description_blz.es_MX: Los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo contra ti provocan que recibas Voluntad centrada, lo que reduce el daño que recibes un 15% durante 8 s, se acumula hasta 1 veces.
description_blz.pt_BR: Ataques corpo a corpo contra você lhe concedem Vontade Férrea, reduzindo em 15% o dano recebido por você por 8 s. Acumula até 1 vezes.
description_blz.de_DE: Nahkampfangriffe auf Euch lösen den Effekt 'Fokussierter Wille' aus, der 8 Sek. lang Euren erlittenen Schaden um 15% verringert. Bis zu 1-mal stapelbar.
description_blz.en_GB: Melee attacks against you cause you to gain Focused Will, reducing damage you take by 15% for 8 sec, stacking up to 1 times.
description_blz.es_ES: Los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo contra ti te otorgan Voluntad centrada, lo que reduce el daño que recibes un 15% durante 8 s. Se acumula hasta 1 veces.
description_blz.fr_FR: Les attaques de mêlée subies confèrent Volonté focalisée, ce qui réduit les dégâts subis de 15 % pendant 8 s, cet effet étant cumulable jusqu’à 1 fois.
description_blz.it_IT: Gli attacchi in mischia subiti attivano Volontà Focalizzata, riducendo i danni subiti del 15% per 8 s. Si accumula fino a 1 volte.
description_blz.ru_RU: Направленные против вас атаки ближнего боя дают вам эффект "Средоточие воли", уменьшающий получаемый урон на 15% на 8 сек Суммируется до 1 раз.
description_blz.ko_KR: 근접 공격을 받으면 의지 집중 효과를 얻어, 8초 동안 받는 피해가 15%만큼 감소합니다. 최대 1번까지 중첩됩니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 受到近戰攻擊時，可獲得意志專注，使你受到的傷害降低15%，持續8秒，最多可堆疊1層。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你受到近战攻击时会获得专注意志效果，使你受到的伤害降低15%，持续8秒，最多叠加1次。
